HDG.LOG.content: logos essentially occurs as en panta [wholeness] > [all uniting is the one, gathering, centrifugal] > logos, gathering everything (alles) in the totality (All) of simple presencing? > Der logos legt ins Anwesen vor und legt das Anwesende ins Anwesen nieder, d.h. zur체ck [heterotautology: laying back into presence what is present before] > presencing: having come forward to endure in unconcealment (hervorgekommen im Unverborgenen w채hren) [endure, linger awhile, totality]
